## Visualization Fundamentals

### The Grammar of Graphics

- **Data**: What you're visualizing
- **Aesthetics**: How variables map to visual properties
- **Geoms**: Visual marks (points, lines, bars)
- **Scales**: How data maps to aesthetics
- **Facets**: Multiple plots in one

---

## R Visualization Stack

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false

library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

# Create basic plot
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = hp)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()

# Make it interactive
ggplotly(p)
```

---

## Python Visualization Tools

- **Matplotlib**: Publication-quality static plots
- **Seaborn**: Statistical visualizations
- **Plotly**: Interactive web visualizations
- **Bokeh**: Modern browser visualizations
